original_title: Rammstein: In Amerika - Live from Madison Square Garden
overview: Only 20 minutes into the pre-sale, Madison Square Garden, New York announces: Sold out!  The concert film celebrates the band’s legendary show in New York’s Madison Square Garden – Rammstein’s return to the US after a ten-year absence. In HD and 5.1 surround sound.
title: Rammstein: In Amerika - Live from Madison Square Garden
